priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Microbiology Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C120528

self.title: CDISC SDTM Microbiology Test Name Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the microbiology test names of the CDISC Study Data Tabulation Model.
name: Microbiology Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Microbiology Test Name Terminology

terms.definition: A measurement of any rod-shaped bacteria that resist decolorizing by acid after accepting an aqueous stain solution, due to the mycolic acids in their cell walls.
A measurement of the organisms that are not assigned to the species level but are assigned to the Burkholderia genus level in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Burkholderia cepacia in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Clostridium difficile glutamate dehydrogenase in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Clostridium difficile in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the 027/NAP1/BI strain of Clostridium difficile in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Clostridium difficile toxin A in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Clostridium difficile A and/or B toxin in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Clostridium difficile A and/or B Toxin Measurement

terms.definition: A measurement of the Clostridium difficile toxin B in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Clostridium difficile binary toxin (cdt) DNA in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Clostridium difficile toxin A (tcdA) DNA in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Clostridium difficile toxin B (tcdB) DNA in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Clostridium difficile regulatory protein (tcdC) DNA in a biological specimen.
A measurement of a targeted deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Ebola virus IgM antibodies in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the organisms that are not assigned to the species level but are assigned to the Haemophilus genus level in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Haemophilus influenza virus in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Hepatitis C virus RNA in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Hepatitis E virus RNA in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the influenza A antigen in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the influenza A and/or B antigen in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the influenza B antigen in a biological specimen.
The identification of the type of a microbial organism in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the organisms that are assigned to the Mycobacterium tuberculosis species in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the organisms assignable to the Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the organisms that are assigned to the Mycobacterium genus but are not tuberculosis or leprosy-causing in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the mucoid strain of Pseudomonas aeruginosa in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the non-mucoid strain of Pseudomonas aeruginosa in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the small-colony variant strain of Pseudomonas aeruginosa in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Plasmodium knowlesi in an asexual replication stage in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Plasmodium knowlesi in a sexual replication stage in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the methicillin-resistant strain of Staphylococcus aureus in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the methicillin-susceptible strain of Staphylococcus aureus in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Staphylococcus aureus in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the organisms that are assigned to the Stenotrophomonas maltophilia species in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the toxigenic strain of Clostridium difficile in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the toxin B-producing strain of Clostridium difficile in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Zaire ebolavirus present in a biological specimen.
